channel.title: How to make npc drop
channel.description: annyone know how to make npc drop stuff

item.title: How to make npc drop
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Go into npchandler.java and search for

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCI

Under all this

{ { if (IsDropping == false) { IsDropping = true; int Play = GetNpcKiller(NPCID); int Maxi = server.itemHandler.DropItemCount; for (int i = 0; i <= Maxi; i++) { if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) { } else { int NPCID2 = NPCID+34; System.out.println("Npc id =" +NPCID); if(npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null && server.playerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(NPCID)] != null) { if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(4206, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
Add this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == X) { ItemHandler.addItem(Y, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
X = npc id
Y = item it drops

Read full topic
